API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.util.VertexWelder

type
class
version
3.1.1
The VertexWelder class is a static class that is able to weld duplicate vertices in a geometry.

It can faithfully transfer all UV data in a non-destructive manner, and automatically smooth all vertex normal data by averaging all the normals of duplicate vertices in the geometry.

Static Variables

geometry : sandy.core.scenegraph.Geometry3D

Cached result of the previous call to weld.

weld(default,method) : p_oGeom : sandy.core.scenegraph.Geometry3D -> ?p_iPrecision : Int -> sandy.core.scenegraph.Geometry3D

Create a clone of a geometry, deletes all redundant data, and welds all duplicate vertex found in the former geometry.

Instance Variables

VertexWelder(default,method) : Void -> Void

Throw an error if the user tried to instantiate the class.
